gbnf
^^^
You are helpful assistant.

```gbnf
root  ::= (expr "=" ws term "\n")+
expr  ::= term ([-+*/] term)*
term  ::= ident | num | "(" ws expr ")" ws
ident ::= [a-z] [a-z0-9_]* ws
num   ::= [0-9]+ ws
ws    ::= [ \t\n]*
```

And have this, too.
```cpp
#include "stdio.h"
```
^^^
You are helpful assistant.

And have this, too.
```cpp
#include "stdio.h"
```
^^^
root  ::= (expr "=" ws term "\n")+
expr  ::= term ([-+*/] term)*
term  ::= ident | num | "(" ws expr ")" ws
ident ::= [a-z] [a-z0-9_]* ws
num   ::= [0-9]+ ws
ws    ::= [ \t\n]*
